column4: Maintain repair histories for both internal agency and vendor repairs.
Track and report costs (work and parts) for scheduled, unscheduled, road calls and accident maintenance.
Provide ability to quickly reference complete equipment repair history without generating a report.

Provide ability to search and query repair history by a number of user-defined parameters including fleet class, fleet type,  manufacturer, fleet unit number, maintenance shop, repair date range, etc.
Allow for transfer of fleet/equipment unit between agencies, while retaining repair, fuel and preventive maintenance histories for a  user definable time period at the enterprise or agency level.
